title: Point of entry
creator_contributor_role: Plant Quarantine Publicity Campaign, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant quarantine - Australia
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plants - Disease and pest resistance
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Quarantine - Australia
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Australia - Safety aspects
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Agriculture - Australia - Safety aspects
description: In order to keep unwanted pests out of Australia, constant vigilance must be maintained at points of entry. This film deals mainly with the dangers to plants and crops if precautions are not exercised, and shows some of the methods taken to safeguard Australia's plant life.
